# Thread.try_new method

```csharp
public static IntPtr try_new(string name, ThreadFunc func, IntPtr data, out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| func | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full
